ho ithuta ka mochini: Li-algorithms tse nolofalletsang likhomphutha ho ithuta ho tsoa ho data
Neural network: Sistimi ea komporo e bululetsoeng ke sebopeho sa boko
thuto e tebileng: E sebelisa marang-rang a marang-rang a mangata bakeng sa mesebetsi e rarahaneng
nlp: E nolofalletsa likhomphutha ho utloisisa le ho sebetsana le puo ea batho
pono ea k'homphieutha: E lumella likhomphutha ho "bona" le ho hlalosa lintlha tse bonoang
ho matlafatsa thuto: Ho ithuta ka liteko le liphoso ka meputso le likotlo
thuto e okametseng: Ho ithuta ho data e ngoliloeng e nang le li-input-output pairs
thuto e sa beheng leihlo: Ho fumana lipaterone ho data ntle le lileibole tse boletsoeng esale pele
merafo ya data: Ho sibolla mekhoa ka har'a li-dataset tse kholo le tse rarahaneng
tsamaiso ea litsebi: E etsisa bokhoni ba ho etsa liqeto ba setsebi sa batho
batla algorithm: E hlahloba sebaka sa bothata ka mokhoa oa mekhoa ho fumana tharollo
boemedi ba tsebo: Mokhoa oa ho hlophisa le ho bolokoa tlhahisoleseling bakeng sa litsamaiso tsa AI
liroboto: Tšimo e sebetsanang le meralo, kaho le tšebeliso ea liroboto
chatbot: Lenaneo la k'homphieutha le etsisang moqoqo le motho
agi: Hypothetical AI e nang le bohlale ba boemo ba motho mesebetsing e mengata
algorithm ea liphatsa tsa lefutso: Mokhoa oa ho batla o bululetsoeng ke mekhoa ea tlhaho ea ho iphetola ha lintho
sefate sa qeto: Mohlala o kang oa sefate bakeng sa ho arola data ho latela likarolo
mochine oa vector oa t\u0161ehetso: Algorithm ea ho fumana mola kapa hyperplane e arolang data hantle
marang-rang a bayesian: Mohlala oa Probabilistic o emelang likamano lipakeng tsa mefuta-futa
logic e fuzzy: E sebetsana le ho beha mabaka ka mokhoa o hakanyetsoang ho e-na le ho nepahala
moloko oa puo ea tlhaho: Ho hlahisa mongolo o kang oa motho ho tsoa ho data e hlophisitsoeng
tlhahlobo ea maikutlo: Ho fumana moelelo wa maikutlo kapa maikemisetso ka mora sengolwa
temoho ea set\u0161oant\u0161o: Ho hloaea lintho kapa likarolo ka har'a litšoantšo
temoho ya sefahleho: Theknoloji ea biometric e khethollang batho ka likarolo tsa sefahleho
koloi e ikemetseng: Likoloi tse khonang ho lemoha tikoloho ea tsona le ho tsamaea ntle le tlhahiso ea motho
phetolelo ea mochine: Phetolelo ea mongolo ho tloha puong e 'ngoe ho ea ho e 'ngoe
sistimi ea khothaletso: E bolela esale pele khetho ea mosebelisi ho sisinya lintho kapa litaba
mohlala oa mohanyetsi: Kenyelletso e etselitsoeng ho thetsa mofuta oa ho ithuta oa mochini
ho fetisetsa thuto: Ho sebelisa hape tsebo ho tsoa mosebetsing o mong ho ntlafatsa ho ithuta ho o mong
mohlala o hlahisang: Mohlala oa AI o khona ho theha data e ncha e ts'oanang le sete ea eona ea koetliso
AI ea t\u0161oant\u0161etso: AI e ipapisitse le matšoao le melao e sebetsang (bapisa le marang-rang a neural)
tsamaiso ea batho ba bangata: Pokello ea baemeli ba AI ba sebelisanang sebakeng se arolelanoeng
probabilistic programming: Ho sebelisa lipuo tsa lenaneo ho hlalosa mefuta e ka bang teng
khomphutha ea neuromorphic: Hardware e etselitsoeng ho etsisa ts'ebetso ea methapo ea kutlo
